text: R package, dubois, aids users render Du Bois styled plots custom datasets. W.E.B. Du Bois (February 23, 1868 – August 27, 1963) American sociologist, socialist, historian Pan-Africanist civil rights activist. Born Great Barrington, Massachusetts, Du Bois grew relatively tolerant integrated community, completing graduate work University Berlin Harvard, first African American earn doctorate, became professor history, sociology economics Atlanta University. Du Bois one founders National Association Advancement Colored People (NAACP) 1909 (Source: Wikpedia). 1900 Paris Exposition team made historical display. presented many charts situation Black people Georgia US general. timelessness posters provoked dataviz community created challenges reproduce using modern tools. #DuBoisChallenge2022 starting point dubois package. package development functions: db_area: creates vertical area chart two categories together amount 100%.

    datasets
code: library(dubois)  data <- dubois::managers %>%   dplyr::select(race, year, pct_bosses_total) %>%   tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = "race",                      values_from = "pct_bosses_total")  title <- "PARTICIPATION IN MANAGERIAL POSITIONS BY RACE IN BRAZIL." subtitle <- "INSPIRED BY: W.E.B. DU BOIS | DATA FROM: IBGE | GRAPHIC BY: ICARO BERNARDES" message <- "IN THE SERIES, USUALLY WHITES OCCUPY SLIGHTLY LESS GENERAL WORK POSITIONS. HOWEVER WHITES OCCUPY WAY MORE MANAGERIAL POSITIONS THAN BLACKS"  dubois::db_area(data = data, order = "year", cat1 = "black", cat2 = "white",                 limits = c(-3,4), path = "man/figures", filename = "managers.png",                 title = title,                 subtitle = subtitle,                 message = message)

Du Bois area plot — db_area
text: Creates area plot two categories (cat1 cat2) values order variable. shown terms percentage sum 100%. values categories associated horizontal axis. areas stacked horizontally. rightmost category (red) values highlighted vertical axis right. order variable shown vertical axis labeled left. axes inverted. bounded random walk effect can added left area (like plot torn) function parameters (seed, res_step limits). Furthermore, three slots text (title, subtitle message)

title: Du Bois area plot — db_area
text: data data-frame class object: data shown area plot. row must contain value two categories well one instance order variable. order character: name order variable. cat1 character: name leftmost category (red). values highlighted vertical axis. cat2 character: name rightmost category (black). dpi integer: resolution rendered texts image. seed integer: seed used calculate bounded random walk. res_step numeric: product res_step numeric range order variable defines step size bounded random walk. limits numeric vector: lower superior limits bound random walk. Must given order: (lower, superior). names character vector: names categories. shown first areas superior part plot vertical axis title left. title character: text top plot subtitle character: text title message character: text bottom plot. brown background. path character: path save image plot. filename character: name image extension.
